reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting China to develop a talent management database for greenhouse gas experts

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon UK expertise to assist China's development of a national training, qualification, and registration database for Greenhouse Gas experts, available to market participants. In doing so, it intends to upgrade China's knowledge base, help ensure that experts are properly qualified/certified, and further ensure the orderly operation of the national Emissions Trading Scheme through the scoping of a centralised talent management system by mid 2017.
